name: Cashmere Mist Eau de Parfum Travel Spray
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Lily of the Valley, Moroccan Jasmine, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:Unapologetically yours. Cashmere Mist Eau de Parfum is the iconic scent of self-indulgence. A way to celebrate yourself each and every day, it’s a light, sensual scent infused with essences of Moroccan jasmine, lily of the valley, and warm sandalwood..About the Bottle:Designed by Donna Karan’s late husband, sculptor Stephan Weiss, the iconic Cashmere Mist Eau de Parfum bottle mirrors the sensual lines of the female form in glass..About the Fragrance:Inspired by the iconic bottle itself, the campaign is an unapologetic celebration of the female body. A study in self-acceptance and self-indulgence, it’s sensual and evocative—it’s about embracing your body and treating it to a moment all its own.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Cashmere Mist Fragrance, Water, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Limonene, Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Geraniol, Citral, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Farnesol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Eugenol, Benzyl Alcohol, Isoeugenol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent..-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly..-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent..-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

shades.shade_name: 0.23 oz / 7 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells beautiful, however not identical to the deodorant. I’d say they’re about 80% similar but the scent is not quite as sharp.
This is an amazing scent!  Hate to admit it, but my Mom actually wore it, and it has stood the test of time.  Gorgeous fragrance!!

reviews.review_title: If your on the fence, dont !!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited about my purchase - but unfortunately the scent faded within minutes . Very disappointed as it is a lovely scent.
